useCase.name: Data Storage Indication Process
useCase.description: A researcher accesses the DMPTool to document their data storage plans, stores data storage locations, updates metadata, confirms data storage plan, informs institutional systems, confirms plan saved, and displays success message.

preconditions.precondition: The researcher has access to the DMPTool
Data storage locations need to be identified during and after the project

mainSequence.step: Choose to document data storage plans
Input data storage locations during and after the project
